propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

alignLeft.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

alignRight.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

alignAlternate.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

missingOppositeContent.description: Styles applied to the root element if TimelineOppositeContent isn't provided.

content.description: Styles applied to the timeline content node.

oppositeContent.description: Styles applied to the timeline opposite content node.
